name: SHENZHEN I/O
descr: 关于此游戏Build circuits using a variety of components from different manufacturers, like microcontrollers, memory, logic gates, and LCD screens.Write code in a compact and powerful assembly language where every instruction can be conditionally executed.Read the included manual, which includes over 30 pages of original datasheets, reference guides, and technical diagrams.Get to know the colorful cast of characters at your new employer, 深圳龙腾科技有限公司 (Shenzhen Longteng Electronics Co., Ltd.), located in the electronics capital of the world.Get creative! Design and test your own games and devices in the sandbox.Engineering is hard! Take a break and play a brand-new twist on solitaire.
detail:
名称: SHENZHEN I/O
类型: 独立, 模拟
开发者: Zachtronics
发行商: Zachtronics
发行日期: 2016 年 11 月 17 日
review: 最近评测: 特别好评 (14) - 过去 30 天内的 14 篇用户评测中有 92% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评如潮 (3,419) - 此游戏的 3,419 篇用户评测中有 95% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评如潮 (3,419 篇中的 95%) 发布至今
最近评测: 特别好评 (14 篇中的 92%) 最近
